description: beaker form with pointed outward-flaring element near bottom and outward-flaring mouth; faceted body; cartouches with landscapes, birds, flowers, man with deer, boaters, pavilions and brocade designs; blue, orange, gold, green
markings: on underside, in blue: six-character inscription
medium: Imari ware; glazed porcelain, polychrome enamel
text: This is a fine example of the ware produced in Arita for export to Europe. In China, such vases were produced as well in a Japanese-style.
title: Beaker vase
